title: How to Compress a PDF Without Ruining Quality
description: Practical settings and trade-offs to shrink PDF size while keeping it sharp. Works 100% locally in your browser.

description: The cleanest way to combine multiple PDFs, reorder pages, and keep metadata.

description: Examples of page ranges (1-3,5,8-10), when to zip, and how to avoid blank pages.

description: What DPI really changes, recommended JPEG quality for print vs web, and transparent backgrounds.

title: Local-First PDF Tools: Why Privacy Matters
description: No uploads, no servers. A quick look at how browser-only processing protects your documents.

description: How to deal with missing fonts, heavy scans, and malformed files using simple, local tricks.
